      void receivePlayRoadBuildingCardRequest​(PlayRoadBuildingCard playRoadBuildingCard, boolean firstCheckPerformed)
      this method needs to check if the chosen streets are legal and handle accordingly - however, it is possible that the streets are legal only if checked in the reverted order - the second street is required for the first to be legal that's why this method needs to be called twice, once with street1, street2 and then with street2, street1

      • receivePlayer

        public void receivePlayer​(PlayerForProtocol player)
        After receiving a player we want to add him to the list if he matches all the conditions (no double colors,...).
        Parameters:
        player - The new connected player we potentially want to add to the list.

      • receiveStartGameRequest

        public void receiveStartGameRequest​()
        After receiving a game-start the server checks whether all clients are ready or not. If so, he must then send a notification to all clients that the game has started. A game can only start if a minimum of 3 players have joined. !!!!WARNING!!! Disconnecting a player during the lobby after marking himself as ready will result in bugs and issues!

      • receivePlayRoadBuildingCardRequest

        public void receivePlayRoadBuildingCardRequest​(PlayRoadBuildingCard playRoadBuildingCard,
                                               boolean firstCheckPerformed)
        this method needs to check if the chosen streets are legal and handle accordingly - however, it is possible that the streets are legal only if checked in the reverted order - the second street is required for the first to be legal that's why this method needs to be called twice, once with street1, street2 and then with street2, street1
        Parameters:
        playRoadBuildingCard -
        firstCheckPerformed - 0 by the first check, 1 by the second one (reverted order)
